justification: Misreads Team B: they prefer possession WRs/workhorse RBs and low variance, but A offers two volatile deep-threat rookies and calls them “stable.” B already has viable QBs and Carter is Out (Tier 5), so while B might dump him, the rationale doesn’t align with B’s stated values. Trade is mechanically feasible but poorly targeted; acceptance probability is overstated given B’s conservative, consensus-trusting profile.
